messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Re: A new unschooler is born
messages.msgSnippet: Congratulations on the new Unschooler Kelly! Laura D Who just found out yesterday that we are going to have another : )!
messages.messageBody:
Congratulations on the new Unschooler Kelly!


Laura D
Who just found out yesterday that we are going to have another : )!
<<<Subject: a new unschooler is born

Alexander William Lenhart was born at 4:02 AM on August 24. He weighted 8
lbs and 4 oz. He's got a big shock of black hair and is cute as a button.
I got home Monday afternoon and all is well. Except, of course, that I am
now realizing I was out of my mind to do this...-grin-

Just thought I'd let people know that I won't be signing things "the
pregnant one" any more.

Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: A new unschooler is born
messages.msgSnippet: CONGRATULATIONS!!! On the birth of your son!  Glad that you are home and all is well. Have fun!, Lisa Date: Thu, 28 Aug 2003 01:19:38 -0400 From: Kelly
messages.messageBody:
CONGRATULATIONS!!!

On the birth of your son! Glad that you are home and all is well.
Have fun!, Lisa


Date: Thu, 28 Aug 2003 01:19:38 -0400
From: "Kelly Lenhart" <mina@...>
Subject: a new unschooler is born

Alexander William Lenhart was born at 4:02 AM on August 24. He weighted 8
lbs and 4 oz. He's got a big shock of black hair and is cute as a button.
I got home Monday afternoon and all is well. Except, of course, that I am
now realizing I was out of my mind to do this...-grin-

Just thought I'd let people know that I won't be signing things "the
pregnant one" any more.

Kelly
